member.name: T:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions
member.summary: Important functions used by many Autosoft programs

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.GetValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Acquire the appropriate value from the user file.
member.param: The data for the current user
member.returns: Returns the data for the property. If no data is found, a blank string is returned.

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.ConvertToQuotes(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a formatted string to one appropriate for viewing
member.returns: A string with the quotation marks updated

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.EnumerateStrings(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerates through the string and returns a list of strings.
member.returns: Returns a list of strings that have been found

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.EnumerateStrings(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Enumerates through the string and returns a list of strings.
member.param: The data for the current user
member.returns: Returns a list of strings that have been found

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.EnumerateIntegers(System.String)
member.summary: Enumerates through the string and returns a list of integers.
member.returns: Returns a list of integers that have been found

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.EnumerateIntegers(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Enumerates through the string and returns a list of integers.
member.param: The data for the current user
member.returns: Returns a list of integers that have been found

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.GetWelcomeMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a welcome message, which will be seen by the user
member.returns: A welcome message, acontaining the user's name

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.ReplaceValue(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replaces a string containing the function with the new data, returning a string
member.param: The new data to be used
member.returns: A string containing the new data

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.ReplaceValue(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Replaces a string containing the function with the new data, returning a string
member.param: The new data to be used
Specifies whether a new line should be created if the name is not found
member.returns: A string containing the new data

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.GetTimeLabel(System.Double)
member.summary: Converts the specified timespan to a readable string
member.param: The total seconds which will be converted

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.GetTimeLabel(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Converts the specified timespan to a readable string

member.name: M:Record_Pro_Functions.BasicFunctions.GetFriendlyText(System.String[])
member.summary: Converts a list of strings to friendly text
member.returns: The list of elements converted to a friendly string
